metadata.Title: CVE-2021-30799 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description:
Multiple memory corruption issues were addressed with improved memoryhandling. This issue is fixed in iOS 14.7, macOS Big Sur 11.5, SecurityUpdate 2021-004 Catalina, Security Update 2021-005 Mojave. Processingmaliciously crafted web content may lead to arbitrary code execution.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-30799` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

gir1.2-javascriptcoregtk-4.0 - 2.32.3-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
gir1.2-webkit2-4.0 - 2.32.3-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
libjavascriptcoregtk-4.0-18 - 2.32.3-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
libjavascriptcoregtk-4.0-bin - 2.32.3-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
libwebkit2gtk-4.0-37 - 2.32.3-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
libwebkit2gtk-4.0-37-gtk2 - 2.32.3-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
webkit2gtk-driver - 2.32.3-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: webkitgtk package in esm-apps/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
webkit2gtk package in esm-infra/bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.32.3-0ubuntu0.18.04.1').
qtwebkit-source package in esm-apps/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
qtwebkit-opensource-src package in esm-apps/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
